product_name: Sherpa Adventure Gear Sibu Shorts - Women's
long_description: HIke in comfort as well as style in the women's Sibu Shorts from Sherpa Adventure Gear. Durable double-weave fabric offers 4-way stretch for freedom of movement. 3 in. side slits feature 2 snap closures each. In addition to hand pockets, the Sibu Shorts from Sherpa Adventure Gear have 1 zippered thigh pocket and 1 back welt pocket. Swirl embroidery design on right leg.
short_description: HIke in comfort as well as style in the women's Sibu Shorts from Sherpa Adventure Gear.
